resetpassword.title: Reset Password
resetpassword.passwordMustBeAtLeast8CharactersLong: Password must be at least 8 characters long
resetpassword.passwordMustContainAtLeastOneUppercaseLe: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
resetpassword.passwordMustContainAtLeastOneNumber: Password must contain at least one number
resetpassword.passwordResetSuccess: You have now successfully changed your password

hero.secondary: Then the Krokad app is perfect for you!

getapp.primary: Be your own fishing expert with Krokad

infosection.title: Analyze your catches, improve your techniques, and maximize your catch potential
infosection.info_text_1: Track your fishing adventures with a detailed catch log. Record the weight, length, species, and location of each catch.
infosection.info_text_2: Gain deep insights into your fishing habits. What is your favorite spot? What time of day are you most successful?
infosection.info_text_3: Easy to use! Our app is designed to be intuitive and easy to navigate.

citat.primary: Download Krokad today and start maximizing your fishing potential!

terms.text_1: By using the services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these Terms and Conditions and agree to be bound by them. If you do not agree to these terms, do not access or use the services.
terms.text_2: To use the services you must register. You agree that Krokad may use your user data to provide services.
terms.text_3: Ownership: All content on the app and website, including text, images, and graphics, is the property of Krokad and is protected by copyright laws. Krokad may change the content at any time, such as by adding or removing features. Non-commercial use: You may view and download content for personal, non-commercial use only. No modification: You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, or display the content without our prior written consent.
terms.text_4: Prohibited activities: You agree to not use the app or website for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, such as disrupt, negatively affect, damage, disable or impair the functioning of the services.
terms.text_5: If you have any questions about these terms, app or website, please contact us at krokad@krokad.se
